author: The Linux Foundation
description:
🔐 What role does model signing play in securing AI pipelines?
💡 Can open source and patents really complement each other?
🌐 Is decentralized identity finally ready for scale?
📦 Why are developers still talking about OpenTofu?
📺 All that (and more) in this week’s LF Quick Hits.

#LFQuickHits #OpenSource #CyberSecurity #FinOps #AI #Cloud
title: Big themes are surfacing across open source this week: AI integrity, cloud economics, decentralized
